nodes.title: Close quotes in Javadoc links in AbstractLogstashTcpSocketAppender
Added mdc fields white list filtering
Add support for logging request & response headers (in logstash-access)
Allow sending access logs  directly to logstash.
Created SSLLogstashTcpSocketAppender to allow to send SSL encrypted log ...
Added LogstashTcpSocketAppender configuration example to README.md.  Added ability to limit length of logger name field and docs for it to README.md.
Made the queue size of the LogstashTcpSocketAppender configurable
LogstashLayout: enabling contextmap to the underlying formatter
Use Jackson Streaming API, and add an extensible way to add event-specific fields to json output

Enhancement: Add support for custom context maps so that JSON fields can be passed directly from log calls

fix typo in example in Readme

Add custom fields and fix some small glitch
shaded jars should be removed from <dependencies>

Add option to split log messages on newlines - fixes #404

add Throwable class name as field

Adopt is no more, long live Zulu!
